name: Wild Horse Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Try yourself being a wild horse with Wild Horse Survival Simulator 3D! Be a wild horse, find food, beware of predators, survive!

As a horse you have freedom of what to do, you can go to the village or run into the forest or mountains. Every horse love freedom, but need to eat, find fresh grass and get stronger. Meet other horses, animals, pets and humans, fully interact in Wild Horse Survival Simulator 3D virtual world. Maintain health, hunger and energy rate, it's vital for your horse!

Wild Horse Survival Simulator 3D features:

- Different missions including survival mode
- Level up your horse every time you get points
- Interact with other wild animals
- Explore wilderness
- Interactive 3D world

This game for those who loves horses and animal simulators! Check Wild Horse Survival Simulator 3D and live the life of a wild horse! Create your own herd, search for food, battle against other wild animals!
